title: Pervaiz Elahi meets Shehbaz, condoles death of Begum Shamim
content:
LAHORE, Dec 03 (APP): Punjab Assembly Speaker Chaudhry Pervaiz Elahi along with a delegation met Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N) president Shehbaz Sharif at Model Town here on Thursday to condole the death of Begum Shamim Akhtar.
Chaudhry Pervaiz Elahi expressed heartfelt sympathies on the death of Shehbaz Sharifâ€™s mother, late Begum Shamim, and also offered Fateha for the departed soul.
He also extended condolence on behalf of Chaudhry Shujaat Hussain.
Maryam Nawaz, Hamza Shehbaz, Shahid Khaqan Abbasi, Ahsan Iqbal and others were also present whereas Ch Moonis Elahi, Kamil Ali Agha were among the delegation.
